attributes.action: legalise the use of the "Segway" in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At current the American mode of transport, the "Segway" is not legal as it cannot be decided by the government whether it is a Pedestrian aid or a Vehicle therefore we are being prevented from being Green by a government that is pushing us to be Greener, or "AS GREEN AS WE CAN POSSIBLY BE"
